name: My Cute Little Sacrifice (Mini Jam 110)
description:
Some little game for jam.

Top-down shooter with somewhat  mystic atmosphere.

Epilepsy warning: this game contain flashing light, please be careful

Content warning: blood, gore, desperation

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Space - Dash

LMB - Shoot

RMB, R - Reload
